title: Lata Mangeshkar
summary: Lata Mangeshkar ([ləˈtaː məŋˈɡeːʃkər] (listen)) (born Hema Mangeshkar; 28 September 1929) is an Indian playback singer and music director. She is one of the best-known and most respected playback singers in India.[4][5] She has recorded songs in over a thousand Hindi films and has sung songs in over thirty-six Indian languages and foreign languages, though primarily in Hindi and Marathi.
